name: Santa's Workbench
description:
Santa's Workbench

Made for the Secrete Santa Jam 

Play as robot-Santa in a world filled with evil robots. Your goal is to assemble as many toys as possible before you die. 

Each toy has its individual toy parts scattered across the map (Use your radar to help), so you must search for them to assemble the toy into a present at Santa's Workbench.

Controls

Left Click - Fire

Right Click - Grab toy/Give toy to workbench
